gate.stanford

Class StanfordSentence

  • java.lang.Object
    • gate.stanford.StanfordSentence

  • public class StanfordSentence
extends Object
    The Stanford Parser itself takes as input a List of edu.stanford.nlp.ling.Word. This data structure is constructed from a Sentence Annotation, using the enclosed Token Annotations, and yields the required List, as well as methods for converting the parser's output spans into GATE Annotation offsets.

        protected static String escapeToken(String token)
        Change the Token's string to match the Penn Treebank's escaping system. See Stanford parser FAQ "How can I provide the correct tokenization of my sentence to the parser?"
        Parameters:
        token - original string feature of Token
        Returns:
        escaped version of string
